articles.description: Know the Men’s FIH Hockey World Cup 2023 results and scores for all matches. Get group standings and scorecards from the knockout rounds, including final.
articles.content:
The FIH Men's Hockey World Cup 2023, underway in Odishas Bhubaneswar and Rourkela from January 13 to 29, features 16 top teams from across the globe to fight it out for the coveted title.
The 16 tea… [+6264 chars]
